Articles.Content:
Simple, say something you learned today.

I will start.

I learned my shirt I always wear is so big I can use it as a flotation device in water. XD
I learned that you could do somthing to make ksp run faster.
I learned how to Sun-Dive in KSP.

I figured out how to use the airbrush in GIMP to create awesome pictures.

<-----
I figured out that water bottles tend to leak a lot more than you\'d expect.
I learned that nasty sunburns will result in your back looking like a mutant due to peeling.
I learned that learning can be interesting!
I learned that people enjoy knowing other people\'s latest discoveries.
I learned that Milestone is a magician!

I learned today, that meters/second can be transferred in kilometers/hour, just by multiplying m/s number by 3.6.

I.E.: 100m/s is a 100*3,6= 360 km/h. Strange that i did not know this before.
TIL Lonesome George died.
I learned that playing a game of Cold War is 99% likely to cause headache syndrome.
That a day to \'Kerbalnaut\' is less than 24 hours.

I learned that I am a furry.

And vacations are boring.
I learned that I don\'t have any sense for 3D because I played a game half an hour until I noticed that it was using sprite-based graphics instead of meshes...
I\'ve learned that two handful of popcorn in the microwave bowl are too much ;D
I learned that terraria is funner with friends.
I learned that the Ultramarines were legion XIII of the original twenty space marine legions.
TIL that ragtime music is good for the soul
english teleshopping is fun ;D

~Dear diary,

TODAY I LEARNED that MAGNESIUM is NOT a good material for HEAT RESISTANT SUNGLASSES.

Over 500 test subjects were BLINDED.
I Learned to top counting down til MLP: FiM Season 3 because IT IS TAKING FOREVER.

Oh gosh, what did I learn today?

I learned about how to make smoother vectors in GIMP but that\'s about it.
I learned how to implement quaternions for a point cloud renderer I made. Procedural galaxy, here I come!

I learned that anything can cause a toe to bleed, even hitting an ant.

(I fail)
